## Device Information

**Device Name:** [e.g., Samsung Galaxy S21]
**Manufacturer:** [e.g., Samsung]
**Model:** [e.g., SM-G991U]
**USB VID:PID:** [e.g., 0x04e8:0x6860]
**Operating System:** [e.g., Android 13]
**Firmware Version:** [if known]

## Submission Type

- [ ] New device support
- [ ] Update existing device configuration
- [ ] Bug fix for existing device

## Collected Evidence

### Files Included

- [x] `submission.json` - Main manifest
- [x] `probe.json` - Device capabilities and operations
- [x] `usb-dump.txt` - USB interface analysis
- [ ] `bench-*.csv` - Performance benchmarks (optional but recommended)
- [x] `quirk-suggestion.json` - Generated quirk configuration
- [x] `.salt` - Redaction salt for privacy

### Validation Status

- [x] Local validation passed (`./scripts/validate-submission.sh`)
- [ ] CI validation passed
- [ ] Schema compliance verified

## Device Behavior Observed

### Basic Functionality

- [ ] Device detection works
- [ ] Basic file operations (list, read, write)
- [ ] Large file transfers
- [ ] Directory navigation

### Performance

- [ ] Read speed: [e.g., ~15 MB/s]
- [ ] Write speed: [e.g., ~12 MB/s]
- [ ] Stability: [reliable/unstable/intermittent]

### Known Issues

- [ ] No known issues
- [ ] Intermittent connection drops
- [ ] Slow performance on large files
- [ ] Permission/access issues
- [ ] Other: [describe]

## Privacy and Consent

- [x] I confirm that no personal data is included in this submission
- [x] I confirm that serial numbers have been redacted using HMAC-SHA256
- [x] I confirm that no device contents were accessed or included
- [x] I consent to this data being used to improve SwiftMTP device compatibility

## Proposed Quirk Configuration

<!-- The generated quirk-suggestion.json will be displayed here -->

```json
{
  "schemaVersion": "1.0.0",
  "id": "generated-id",
  "match": {
    "vidPid": "0x0000:0x0000"
  },
  "status": "experimental",
  "confidence": "low",
  "overrides": {
    "maxChunkBytes": 2097152,
    "ioTimeoutMs": 15000,
    "stabilizeMs": 400
  }
}
```

## Checklist for Maintainers

### Pre-Merge Validation

- [ ] Submission bundle validates against schema
- [ ] No sensitive data in submission
- [ ] Quirk suggestion is reasonable
- [ ] Device VID:PID not already supported
- [ ] Benchmark data looks realistic (if present)

### Integration Steps

- [ ] Copy quirk suggestion to `Specs/quirks.json`
- [ ] Update device documentation
- [ ] Add device to compatibility matrix
- [ ] Update benchmarks database
- [ ] Test integration with existing codebase

### Post-Merge Actions

- [ ] Update device tuning guide
- [ ] Notify contributor of successful integration
- [ ] Consider adding device to test suite
- [ ] Update changelog with new device support

---

*This PR was generated by `cd SwiftMTPKit && swift run swiftmtp collect --strict --json --noninteractive --open-pr`*

## Commands for Maintainers

```bash
# Validate submission (from repo root)
./scripts/validate-submission.sh Contrib/submissions/[bundle-name]

# Preview proposed quirk
cat Contrib/submissions/[bundle-name]/quirk-suggestion.json

# Integrate quirk after review (sync both canonical locations)
# Edit Specs/quirks.json to add the new entry, then:
cp Specs/quirks.json SwiftMTPKit/Sources/SwiftMTPQuirks/Resources/quirks.json
./scripts/validate-quirks.sh

# Probe device to confirm (requires physical device)
cd SwiftMTPKit && swift run swiftmtp probe

# Run benchmark
cd SwiftMTPKit && swift run swiftmtp bench 100M --out /tmp/bench-verify.csv
```
